questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates explore an island shaped like a drum and encounter a reindeer doctor. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive on a mysterious island governed by strict time rules and encounter the Foxy Pirates. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to transform into a large bird and control ice. What is...?
This ability is a special Paramecia type Devil Fruit that allows the user to interact with the soul and lifespan of themselves and others. What is...?
This member of the Worst Generation, known for their 'Room' ability and Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit, is a notorious pirate and surgeon. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
